card_english.title: A security system guaranteed by insurance.
card_english.content: More than 90% of our crypto is stored offline and the rest is protected by an online security system guaranteed by insurance.

card_english.title: Buy and sell crypto with 0 commissions.
card_english.content: We believe that crypto has to be accessible to everyone, so we provide trading without commission.

card_indo.content: Kami percaya bahwa kripto harus bisa diakses oleh semua orang, sehingga kami menawarkan perdagangan tanpa komisi.

card_indo.content: Pintu bekerja sama dengan berbagai exchange ternama untuk memberikan harga beli dan jual terbaik apapun produk dan jumlahnya.

how_to.title_english: Take your first step with Pintu
how_to.content_indo: Pintu adalah tempat termudah, tercepat, dan paling terpercaya untuk membeli, menjual, mentransfer, dan deposit cryptocurrency.
how_to.content_english: Pintu is the easiest, fastest, and most trusted place for to buy, sell, transfer and save cryptocurrency

card_english.content: We believe that crypto must be accessible to everyone, so we offer trade without commission
More than 90% of your crypto is stored offline and the rest is protected by an online security system guaranteed by insurance
Pintu provides digital assets that are collateralized by fiat currency stored in the bank and regulated by the government, therefore offering a stable price.
Learn about crypto through various categories and explore knowledge about strengths, weaknesses,and the use case for each crypto

card_indo.content: Kami percaya bahwa kripto harus bisa diakses oleh semua orang, sehingga kami menawarkan perdagangan tanpa komisi
Lebih dari 90% kripto anda disimpan secara offline dan sisanya dilindungi oleh sistem keamanan online yang terjamin oleh asuransi
Pintu menyediakan aset kripto yang didukung mata uang nyata yang tersimpan di bank dan diatur oleh pemerintah, sehingga harga tersebut stabil.
